lead_paragraph: American Kendra Harrison earned some consolation for the heartache of missing out on the Rio Olympics when she broke a 28-year-old world record by winning the 100 meters hurdles in 12.20 seconds at the London Diamond League on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Harrison Breaks 28-Year-Old 100 Meters Hurdles World Record
headline.main: Harrison Breaks 28-Year-Old 100 Meters Hurdles World Record
